header.name: Patrice Rivest
header.title: Business Executive | Sales & Growth Leadership | B2B Market Positioning

profile.title: Executive Profile
profile.content: Results-driven business executive with 25+ years of progressive leadership experience driving revenue growth, market expansion, and organizational transformation. Proven track record scaling operations from single-province to Canada-wide distribution while consistently delivering industry-leading profit margins. Strategic thinker skilled in building high-performance teams, implementing data-driven growth strategies, and repositioning brands for market leadership. Demonstrated expertise in sales force optimization, marketing transformation, and operational restructuring across Fortune 500 and growth-stage organizations.

positions.title: President
positions.description: Led national distribution and dealer network operations for Segway Powersports products across Canada. Managed import, distribution, and service delivery infrastructure serving dealer network spanning entire country. Oversaw multi-faceted operations including logistics, dealer relations, and after-sales service standards. Implemented AI-driven automation and change management initiatives to optimize operational efficiency and dealer engagement.
achievements: Directed Canada-wide distribution network for premium powersports brand establishing consistent dealer performance standards and compliance
Managed dealer acquisition, relationship development, and performance monitoring ensuring alignment with operational and profitability KPIs
Implemented AI-integrated dealer tracking and communication platforms accelerating decision-making and field accountability
Led field team coaching and strategic dealer development initiatives driving retail and wholesale target achievement
Managed inventory optimization strategies ensuring appropriate month's supply and model mix across national dealer network
Coordinated multi-channel business activation (OEM, specialty markets) supporting revenue diversification across dealer network
